Room.Name: Level One Circular Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the east side of the Tower Castle of Prince Rutger.
Room.LongDescription: North of you is the castle's chapel, and south of you is the castle's Weather Wizard's Climate Room. The walls along here are covered with banners and flags of famous commanders of the past and present. The large green and gold flag with the red dragon in its field belongs to Franchot.
